thread.title: Just A Reminder That "Family Guy" Is Hilarious
thread.title_full: Just A Reminder That "Family Guy" Is Hilarious

author: Andy Golder
title: Just A Reminder That "Family Guy" Is Hilarious
text:
View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307434 2. When the show accurately summed up how male friendships start. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307426 3. When Stewie picked the wrong door. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307425 4. When the newspaper got meta. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307427 5. And when Peter and Homer got REALLY meta. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307436 6. Pretty much anytime Mayor West spoke, but especially when he got a nosebleed. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307428 7. When America got called out. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307429 8. When we learned Meg’s real name. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307430 9. When they came up with a new slogan for Texas… View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307437 10. …and North Dakota. View this image ›
ID: 10307431 11. When Joe needed Lois to find her inner strength. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307432 12. When this happened. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307439 13. When Peter was extra heavy. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307435 14. When Quahog News reporter Tricia Takanawa was honest. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307438 15. When we got this classic cut-away. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307440 16. When we got a small reminder that Brian is, in fact, a dog. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307441 17. When Peter came up with a plan. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307442 18. When they dropped a really good Oral Roberts joke on us. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307443 19. When they burned Eli Manning pretty bad. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307433 20. When they summed up YouTube comments perfectly. View this image ›
Fox ID: 10307444 21. And finally, when Peter did this. View this image ›
